short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Night Shift for Chrome is saving your eyes during reading and helps to save device's battery with a Dark mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension is essential for reading lovers. Whenever you are, you have to care about your health, particularly your eyes. 
The Extension is super easy to use: there are only two buttons: Dark mode - turning all websites in a dark mode - black background and a contrast font; and Reading mode - ambient monitor color.
There is an option for automatically switching colours, just check the checkbox.
Let us know what do you think about the extension in the review!
